Main Macroeconomic Series

2021-12-18

Source: vignettes/articles/Main_Macroeconomic_Series.Rmd
Main_Macroeconomic_Series.Rmd

This article shows the evolution of selected economic indicators of Spain, based on the information provided by Banco de España.

Last update: 18-December-2021.

About tidyBdE

Developed by Diego H. Herrero.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.
